name: Historic Tie Drives
functionStatement: Supports aquatic habitats through streambed material and bedform dynamics. Enhances habitat complexity and streambank stability.
descriptionMarkdown: Screening metric used to evaluate Bed composition and bedform dynamics based on the definition and bin thresholds provided for this metric.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Use available GIS layers/imagery and/or a field screening (as applicable) to quantify or rate the metric according to the provided bin thresholds.

inputs.label: Historic Tie Drives
inputs.helpMarkdown: State/agency datasets, GIS/imagery, and field observations (as applicable).

levels.label: Good
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Good: Never had them, or no remaining evidence. (Suggested index range 0.70-1.0)

levels.label: Fair
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Fair: May have occurred but effects ameliorated. (Suggested index range 0.40-0.69)

levels.label: Poor
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Poor: Occurred and effects persist. (Suggested index range 0.0-0.39)
